mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_cart(account, goodsId, goodsCnt) VALUES (#{account}, #{goodsId}, #{goodsCnt})
mapper.select: SELECT a.cartId, a.account, a.goodsId, a.goodsCnt, b.goodsName, b.goodsPrice FROM tbl_cart a LEFT JOIN tbl_goods b ON a.goodsId = b.goodsId WHERE account = #{account}
SELECT * FROM tbl_cart WHERE account = #{account} AND goodsId = #{goodsId}
